1.content:
Spike didn't have it so bad. He had a spacious living area, 3 large meals a day and he slept with women for a living. The last was not as glamorous as it sounded. He might have enjoyed it if he wasn't 6 inches tall, he wasn't a prisoner, or he got more control over what he was required to do. As it was, there were worse places to be enslaved. Spike was very good at what he did. So good that he was in a special room of the, for lack of a better word, brothel that owned him. He got better treatment, a larger living area, and women paid more to be with him.

Spike's "apartment" was a large studio with a window that faced a room that had walls lined with living area's just like his. He was currently sitting on his couch facing the window and enjoying the great view. The girl who was standing in front of his apartment was bending down to look at the other wall, showing her ass throughout his whole window. This was impressive, as his front window was around 18" long. While Spike couldn't see much of her face, he could make out that she was an attractive redhead and she was with a brown haired companion who, while she did not have quite the lower endowments, made up for it up front (where the redhead was much smaller), probably giving someone on the opposite wall as pleasant a view as Spike was getting.

It wasn't uncommon for women to come in groups as sort of a female bonding activity. In fact, this type of facility had become so commonplace that Spike was unsurprised to see a mother and daughter. The mother was very curvy and just a little bit chubby, but it might have been overlooked if Spike couldn't see the look on her face. She was clearly the domineering type, a type Spike hated. With them, they weren't looking so much for sex as much as abusing someone weaker than them. The mother's dominance was confirmed by a quick look at her daughter. She was much taller than her mother, a bit slimmer in most places, but with one of the largest rear ends Spike had ever seen. She was brunette, like her mother, and looked as though she were afraid to say anything for fear of scolding.

They weren't the only other women "shopping" together, either. There was a large black haired woman who accompanied a curvy brunette, and a pale redhead with an extremely ample bust with a short, slender blonde. The latter were holding hands, though, so they may have been a different sort of companions. In fact, the only people who were unaccompanied were Jessie, the redheaded "sales associate" and a voluptuous young blonde, happily browsing.

With a complete lack of modesty, Spike was sure with so many people in the room he was sure to get a client. He just wasn't sure how he felt about that.

11.content:
Spike simply sat, enjoying his view and watching people mill around. The blonde and the couple selected men and went off to, well, you know. The redhead and brunette were still looking at men on the other side of the room. The redhead backed up, presumably to get a better view of her options, and her gigantic behind pressed against Spike's front window, blocking anything else from view. Since much of the light came from that window, this cast him in darkness.

Spike waited a few moments with the light completely obscured by the redhead's huge butt, when he heard Jessie's voice, muffled by a layer of glass and a colossal ass, but still recognizable.

"Please don't lean on the walls, the windows are not that sturdy."

"Oh, I'm sorry."

And light returned to Spike's room as the eclipsing tush lifted off of his window. The redhead and her friend turned around to look at who had been cast in the shadow of ass. The redhead had a self satisfied look on her face and Spike assumed that she was proud of her immense rear end. Looking at them more clearly as they turned around, Spike saw that his earlier assumptions were right. Both girls were attractive, the brunette with blue eyes, very full lips and a significant chest but a little bit of a belly, the redhead with green eyes, soft features and a small chest but a slimmer stomach.

111.content:
Spike pointed to the Redhead.

"That one." He said into the intercom.

"It's rude to point." Jessie scolded.

The Redhead, as it turned out, didn't mind. She was smiling ear to ear.

"Maybe I should have mooned him, too." The Brunette said dejectedly.

"Lisa, you can go ahead to room 3, Spike will meet you there."

And Lisa the redhead skipped off, leaving her friend to console herself by browsing again.

Spike knew the drill. He went to the front door of his apartment, which opened into a translucent plastic room, about the proportional size of a closet. Jessie would detach it and carry it to the designated room. If there were any other men joining them, though Spike thought that probably wasn't the case this time, they would be picked up as well. It was fairly common for a woman to take multiple men, though usually they picked at least mostly lower priced men, and 1 or 2 from Spike's room. It was a strange experience; technically it was multiple men in the same sexual act, but it was tough for Spike to be uncomfortable with it, because half the time while he was doing his thing, he wouldn't even see the other men, they having been assigned to other parts to stimulate.

Jessie picked up Spike's transporter gently, cradled it against her ample chest with one hand and started off in the direction of the private rooms. Spike liked Jessie well enough, not least because her enormous breasts were currently jiggling against his transporter. She had joked that one day she'd like to sneak in a freebie with him while the top dogs were looking the other way. Spike didn't know if she actually planned on doing it, but he was perfectly willing. He so rarely got to spend any time with a woman that knew him, other than a few of his regulars, who didn't really view him as a person.

Jessie reached room 3 and locked Spike's transporter into the wall slot.

"Good luck" she said, winking as she pushed the button to propel Spike's transporter into the room.

Spike was curious if this was just her flirting with him, or if she saw something in Lisa that he did not.

"Redheads..." Spike muttered as his transporter finished it's short trip through the wall.

Spike now overlooked room three. It was largely empty, with a fair amount of floor space (for various uses) a dresser, filled with assorted props and toys, and stairs from his transporter to a king size bed, which Lisa already sit waiting on.

info.description:
A story about a business in which miniature men are prostituted for profit.

This story will follow a more traditional 'choose your own adventure style' than most of the GTS interactives floating around. Your choices will only be able to influence what Spike does, and you'll have only as much control over anyone else as Spike might. I hope this will give the story an unpredictable spin that I feel is very much lacking in GTS interactives.

No content is off limits. As long as the segment is well written and has no one acting out of character, it will remain untouched and probably receive points.
